findings.message: input "is-release" of workflow_call event has the default value "false", but it is also required. if an input is marked as required, its default value will never be used [events]

input "generate-symbols" of workflow_call event has the default value "false", but it is also required. if an input is marked as required, its default value will never be used [events]
input "upload-to-storage" of workflow_call event has the default value "0", but it is also required. if an input is marked as required, its default value will never be used [events]
